title: Citizen Kane
description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud'.

title: The Maltese Falcon
description: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

title: How Green Was My Valley
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans, he stern, she gentle, raise coal-mining sons and hope their youngest will find a better life.

title: Sullivan's Travels
description: A director of escapist comedies masquerades as a hobo to get life experience for a serious socially conscious film he plans to make.

title: The Lady Eve
description: A trio of card sharks targets a socially awkward heir to a brewery fortune on an ocean liner, but the daughter of the team leader falls for the mark.

title: The Little Foxes
description: The ruthless, money-grubbing Hubbard clan lives in, and poisons, their part of the deep South at the turn of the twentieth century.

title: Sergeant York
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A hillbilly sharpshooter becomes one of the most celebrated American heroes of WWI when he single-handedly attacks a German position, taking 132 prisoners.

title: High Sierra
description: After being released from prison, a notorious thief travels to California to pull off one final heist.

title: Dumbo
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

title: Suspicion
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman, and soon begins to suspect he is planning to murder her.

title: Ball of Fire
description: A group of professors working on a new encyclopedia encounter a mouthy nightclub singer who is wanted by the police to help bring down her mobster boyfriend.

title: Meet John Doe
description: A man needing money agrees to impersonate a nonexistent person who said he'd be committing suicide as a protest, and a political movement begins.

title: Here Comes Mr. Jordan
description: A boxer, mistakenly taken to Heaven before his time, is given a second chance back on Earth.

title: The Wolf Man
description: A practical man returns to his homeland, is attacked by a creature of folklore, and infected with a horrific disease his disciplined mind tells him can not possibly exist.

title: The Devil and Daniel Webster
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic Picture
description: A farmer sells his soul to the Devil for seven years of good luck and prosperity, then attempts to void the contract by hiring the famous orator Daniel Webster to defend him in a trial.

title: They Died with Their Boots On
description: A highly fictionalized account of the life of George Armstrong Custer, from his days at West Point to his death at the Battle of the Little Bighorn.

title: 49th Parallel
description: After a German U-boat is sunk in Hudson Bay, the surviving crew members attempt to evade capture and cross Canada to reach the neutral United States.

title: Shadow of the Thin Man
description: Nick and Nora Charles investigate a murder at a race track that involves a gambling syndicate.

title: The Sea Wolf
description: Three fugitives from the law are picked up by a ship captained by a sadistic tyrant.

title: Hellzapoppin'
description: A pair of comedians try to turn their Broadway play into a movie, but the producer insists on adding a love story, leading to chaotic and surreal results.

title: Major Barbara
description: A Salvation Army major believes she can save souls, but her father, a wealthy munitions manufacturer, challenges her moral convictions.

title: Never Give a Sucker an Even Break
description: W.C. Fields plays himself, pitching a surreal movie script to a producer while dealing with his niece and various eccentric characters.

title: Man Hunt
description: A British hunter vacationing in Bavaria has Adolf Hitler in his gun sight but is captured, beaten, and left for dead. He escapes back to London where he is hounded by German agents.

title: The Strawberry Blonde
description: A man's crush on a beautiful strawberry blonde leads him into a rivalry with a smooth-talking con man.

title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
description: Dr. Jekyll allows his dark side to run wild when he drinks a potion that turns him into the evil Mr. Hyde.

title: Blood and Sand
description: An illiterate peasant rises to fame as a matador, but his success is threatened by his love for a beautiful aristocrat.

title: That Hamilton Woman
description: The story of the romance between Lord Horatio Nelson and Emma, Lady Hamilton, set against the backdrop of the Napoleonic Wars.

title: Buck Privates
description: Two bumbling street salesmen enlist in the army to avoid the police, only to find their police nemesis is their drill sergeant.

title: I Wake Up Screaming
description: A promoter is accused of murdering a young actress he made famous, and must find the real killer to clear his name while being pursued by a relentless detective.

title: A Woman's Face
description: A scarred blackmailer with a hatred for society has her face restored by a plastic surgeon, but her new beauty doesn't change her dark past.

title: Ladies in Retirement
description: A housekeeper murders her employer to provide a home for her two mentally unstable sisters.

title: Hold Back the Dawn
description: A Romanian gigolo marries a shy American schoolteacher in Mexico to gain entry into the United States, but eventually falls in love with her.

title: Love Crazy
description: To prevent his wife from divorcing him, an architect feigns insanity.

title: Sun Valley Serenade
description: A big band's publicity stunt to adopt a war refugee goes awry when the refugee turns out to be a beautiful young woman.

title: Charley's Aunt
description: Two Oxford students force their friend to impersonate a rich aunt from Brazil to chaperone their dates.

title: Penny Serenade
description: A couple on the verge of divorce recall their romance, marriage, and the death of their child.

title: The Devil and Miss Jones
description: A tycoon goes undercover in his own department store to ferret out union organizers, but ends up sympathizing with his employees.

title: It Started with Eve
description: A dying millionaire wishes to meet his son's fianc√©e, but when she isn't available, a hat-check girl steps in to play the role.

title: The 47 Ronin
description: A group of samurai set out to avenge the death of their master, a feudal lord who was compelled to commit ritual suicide.

title: Western Union
description: A reformed outlaw saves the Western Union telegraph line from Confederate guerrillas and Indians.

title: Underground
description: Two brothers are on opposite sides of the Nazi movement in Germany: one is a loyal soldier, the other is a leader of the underground resistance.

title: Manpower
description: Two power line workers fight over a woman they both love, leading to a tragic climax during a storm.

title: All Through the Night
description: A gambler stumbles onto a Nazi spy ring in New York City and decides to track them down.

title: The Shepherd of the Hills
description: A young Ozark moonshiner vows to kill the father who deserted his mother, unaware that a stranger in town is the very man he seeks.

title: Swamp Water
description: A man goes into the Okefenokee Swamp to find his lost dog and encounters a fugitive who has been hiding there for years.

title: Pimpernel Smith
description: A British professor smuggles refugees out of Nazi Germany while pretending to be on an archaeological dig.

title: One Foot in Heaven
description: A Methodist minister and his family face the trials and tribulations of changing parishes in early 20th century America.

title: Back Street
description: A woman sacrifices her own happiness to be the mistress of a married banker.

title: Remember the Day
description: An elderly teacher recalls her life, her loves, and her students while waiting to meet a former pupil who is running for president.

title: H.M. Pulham, Esq.
description: A stuffy Boston businessman looks back on his life and wonders if he made the right choices, particularly regarding a beautiful woman he once loved.
